articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Ξd Zynda - What The Func? Ξ🦇🔊
I realize web3 devs love @reactjs 
Everything is in react
Personally React and JSX hurt my eyes so...
Inspired by @dabit3 I decided to create my own @LensProtocol starter app written using...
@sveltejs 🔥🚀
Checkout the repo in progress here: https://github.com/mark3labs/lens-starter

Check out the full series here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLA26elVwRcKhUsBp5zchqdnTZ8VwcOfWP

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
In partnership with @eth_barcelona, we are giving away 3 FREE tickets to attend ETH Barcelona, each worth $499 🤩🪅
Here's how to enter 👇
1. Retweet this tweet along with a short message saying why you want to go 
2. Tag a friend 
See you in Spain! 🇪🇸
ETHBarcelona: Come meet the movers & shakers of the crypto world at Spain’s first Ethereum conference.🇪🇸
3 days of talks, music and festival vibes in the center of #Barcelona 🤩
Come see what the future looks like at this amazing event.🥳
🎟 Get your tickets today at
 http://ethbarcelona.com
articles.title: RT Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): In partnership with @eth_barcelona, we are giving away 3 FREE tickets to attend ETH Barcelona, each worth $499 🤩🪅...
